alert.note: Alert for Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; San Rafael Swell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 29 at 3:18PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms with heavy rain will be possible. * WHERE...A portion of Utah, including the following areas, San Rafael Swell, Capitol Reef National Park and vicinity, Glen Canyon Recreation Area/Lake Powell, Escalante River Basin of the Grand Staircase National Monument and Western Canyonlands. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Thunderstorms with heavy rain may result in rapid onset of flooding in slot canyons, normally dry washes, slickrock areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Capitol Reef National Park and Vicinity; Glen Canyon Recreation Area, Lake Powell; San Rafael Swell; South Central Utah; Western Canyonlands
